# image_processing

Description.
The package image_processing can be used to:
    Processing images:
        - Histrogram matching
        - Structural similarity
        - Resize image
    Utils:
        - Read image
        - Save image
        - Plot image
        - Plot result
        - Plot histogram

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install package_name

***bash
pip install image_processing
***
